descriptionHtml:
Clavicus Vile Mask

Add this to your data folder. Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/ folder, overwrite files if needed

If you like it, endorse it! :)

This is a simple, but hi res re-tex of the Clavicus Vile Mask.

I felt the original was weak looking, like pewter. So I re made it, with a richer and darker texture. Added a slight age patina to give it a look and feel of something much older than the vanilla one.

I also worked over the shadows, and added more definition. The eyes have a light color patina to them and some areas have a little more wear and tear. This should feel like a Daderic artifact, not a cheap trinket.

Enjoy.

Use as you like, just credit me, Jase180! Cheers.
author: jase180
